text: tum eemaanavaalon ka shatru sab logon se badhakar yahoodiyon aur bahudevavaadiyon ko paoge. aur eemaan laanevaalo ke lie mitrata mein sabase nikat un logon ko paoge, jinhonne kaha ki ham nasaara hain. yah is kaaran hai ki unamen bahut-se dharmagyaata aur sansaar-tyaagee sant pae jaate hain. aur is kaaran ki ve ahankaar nahin karate
